availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Williamson Cox (Breckinridge County, Kentucky, justice of the peace)

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, justice of the peace. Virginia native. Married to Nancy D. Cox. Father of Lorenzo D. Cox, Robert W. Cox, Richard W. Cox, Mary E. Cox, and Sallee A. W. Cox. Clerk in Breckinridge County in 1850. Resident of Breckinridge County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Breckinridge County from 1861 to 1870.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District 1, p. 115. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District 1, p. 68. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, Hardinsburg, p. 7. KYR-0001-029-0566.
